评论详情: I absolutely love these wide barefoot shoes for my kids! Knowing their feet are allowed to grow naturally without being squeezed is such a relief. Traditional shoes can cause so many issues later in life, but these give their toes the space they need to spread and develop properly.  They’re comfortable, durable, and look great too. I highly recommend these for any parent who wants to prioritize their children’s foot health!
My kindergartner loves these shoes, they’re easy to put on and have held up nicely
These shoes are super great. Fit well look nice great color easy on/off. :)

We spent a lot of years barefoot living in a tropical climate, and my kids all have wide feet. Traditional sneakers are like prisons for your feet but we love these. My youngest does not have a high arch in his foot, so the velcro strap is a little bit long for him, but it is still functional. Very comfortable and plenty of room to wiggle those toes.

评论概述: Wide toe box makes a world of difference.
评论详情: My granddaughter is tactile defensive. She also has a side foot and the top of her foots arch is very high. I cannot tell the the number of shoes I have bought that do not work. Plus her school requires black closed toed shoes. These check all the boxes for her, her school and her grandmother. 😃 The quality is good. She can be rough on shoes. Plus the style works for most any outfit. She likes them so well we have purchased more in 2 other colors.
Toe front width wider makes this shoe more comfortable for the child
These shoes are a great value! Foot  shaped shoes for kids are often expensive- and they outgrow them quickly. These are flexible, durable and comfortable. Can’t beat them for the price

Got a pair of these for both my young children and they have a super wide toe box and wide flexible sole. They run slightly larger due to that, but overall fit true to size. The light pink of course discolors easily as expected, but still a pretty color.
Great fit, hold up well, kid says they’re comfy. These are his go-to shoes.
mY DAUGHTER HAS A WIDE FOOT AND NEEDED SHOES FOR BOWLING... THEE HAVE BEEN PERFECT FOR HER.. SHE LOVES THEM..  SHE ASKED FOR OTHER COLORS FOR CHRISTMAS
Highly recommended, specially for kids with wide feet

评论详情: You cannot imagine how hard it is to get good sneakers for our wide feet, "I don't ever want to wear any shoes" child. Finally we found these! These are THE sneakers. Wide toes and flexible. They also look so nice. We are so relieved, I mean happy.
-Fit is true to size.  -Very comfortable to wear.  -The color is just as pictured.  -Nice pair of shoes overall.
High quality very flexible and bendy.
Granddaughter loves the color. They arrived just as the description said. Nice shoes

I’m happy that I found minimalist shoes that fit my kid’s very wide feet. The box toe is great and the flexibility of the flat sole. I feel happy knowing that these shoes are giving them free movement for their growing feet.  They are easy to put on if your kids can properly hold the shoe tongue out when they put them on.

These fit exactly as expected. Super easy to get on and off with Velcro closures. The value is outstanding. The material is durable and strong. They are able to go through the washing machine and they have a nice flexible sole. These were got with the intention of having my daughter use them as her indoor shoes for school and these work perfectly for that. They are lightweight and breathable material so for outdoor shoes they would not provide a lot of water resistance. But they are awesome! I’m very happy!  Highly recommend!

This pair of Hobibear shoes have all the best features. They are flexible, yet still supportive and sturdy. The shoes fit well and I like the wide aspect, so my daughter’s feet/toes have room to wiggle while her shoes are appropriately sized. I think the dark fuchsia color is pretty and the mesh and suede look are stylish. The price is reasonable for the quality, fit and comfort. I would recommend.
My daughter loves these shoes. She says they are very comfortable . We love them in pink!
These shoes are sturdy,  yet flexible. They wash well, and are easy for my 3-year-old to get on and off.  They must be comfortable,  because he chooses them over other shoes. Love them.

I ordered these shoes for my grandson and he says they are "super comfortable".  The fit is great, and as expected.  This shoe is well made and seems to be of good quality.  Nice looking sneakers!  We are happy!

评论概述: Comfy, Easy-to-Wear Shoes with Plenty of Toe Room
评论详情: Got these shoes for my kiddo, and they’re a solid pick! 👌  First off, the toe box is super roomy, which is great if your kid’s feet need a bit of space to wiggle. The padding around the ankle and heel is impressive—seems like it’ll prevent any rubbing or discomfort. Plus, the fabric is thick but still breathable, so no sweaty feet drama.  The Velcro strap makes getting them on and off a breeze, which is a win for both of us. Most importantly, my little one says they’re really comfy, and honestly, that’s all I need to hear.  Overall, great design and comfort. Would definitely buy again!

My daughter loved the pink color and the easiness of wearing them. She claims they're very comfortable and plushy inside. She has been wearing them every day for a while.  If she's happy, I'm happy. Great job, shoes, haha!

评论概述: Toxic smell, what are these shoes made of?
评论详情: These shoes filled my entire downstairs with the smell of burnt rubber. While they were still in the box. My eyes would burn and I couldn't figure out where the smell was coming from until I took a whiff of these shoes. Would not recommend.

These are great shoes. Great quality built. They fit true to size and because they are wider can fit better for longer. They seem to be very comfortable and easy put on and take off. The shoe looks nice so it can be a little more dressy or casual. For my normally barefoot kid, these are really great and more comfortable than ones that squish his toes in. I love the Grey and the material is nice.

These are very comfortable shoes. They fit my daughter true to size but they are wide, especially in the toe box. My daughter mostly wears Crocs because she hates having her toes squished so these are right up hear alley because they give her plenty of room to spread her toes when she walks. There's no heel drop so you're getting a nice, natural motion. The shoes feel well made and high quality. My daughter really loves them.

This is my honest review, when I saw these shoes I didn't know whether to buy them, I was guided by the reviews and I was not wrong, these shoes are so cute, comfortable, soft, and of very good quality, and the best thing is that my little girl will have a healthy growth of her feet, thank you for making respectful shoes!

The kids' wide barefoot shoes are fantastic! They’re made of nice quality material and come in a great, bright color that my daughter absolutely loves. I think they run just a bit big, which works well if you want to pair them with thicker socks. The width is perfect, even accommodating my daughter's orthotic inserts comfortably. Plus, they’re incredibly flexible and feel well made. Overall, a great choice!

I want a pair in my size!! These are soo cute. They look so cute on the toddler. They are totally toddler proof, sturdy, washable, and playground worthy. The quality is spot on. The grey is perfect. Love!

These seem excellent. They look and feel nice. They have good bend in the soles. The velcro is strong. I like the wide toe box, which is sometimes hard to find in toddler shoes. I'm not sure if/how much longer they will last than other shoes- if the price tag is justified or not. The bottom is not the super cheap foam like some others out there, so hopefully they will last well.

My family has been wearing barefoot shoes for about 2 years now. We’ve never tried this brand before but I really do like them. As you can see in my picture they are very flexible. These are great - barefoot shoes are definitely the way to go and don't stunt foot growth. Our daughter loves these and say they fit well. Roomy in the shoe box as expected and the color is great. Happy with the velcro as well. Overall really good quality shoes and happy with the value.

These shoes are amazing and look so well-made! My 5 year old son loves them and said they were comfortable. They look expensive! Great shoes.

I got these shoes for my 5 year old daughter. She normally wears a girls 13 and these fit her great. She loves how comfortable they are and instead of wearing her crocs every day to school she's started wearing these.

I'm impressed with these kids' shoes. The construction and materials are rugged. They look like they will stand up to rough outdoor play. The Velcro strap make it easy for kids to put these on without help. Good looking, too. No complaints so far.

评论概述: High quality and stylish kids shoes
评论详情: Very nice quality shoes, lightweight but definitely well made. Shoes are made of seemingly high quality materials. The colorways offered are very attractive, they remind me of skateboarding shoes in a way - or something you'd find at a hipster sneaker shop in a urban center. They are casual, but you could definitely dress them up with a nicer outfit and the sneakers would fit-in just fine. How do they fit?: My daughter has wide feet, and because of the shoes design, they fit her better than most. She noted that they are very comfortable and feel lightweight on her feet. The velcro is easy to operate, but strong enough that it holds the shoes on and doesn't come detached unexpectedly. Size 11 fit my daughter's feet as expected, great value, style and super fast shipping - 5 stars all day!
Soft upper, flexible soles, easy close, and toddler approved!

I got these for my son and they work really well for him. They are soft and comfortable and made of durable material. Having the straps make it easy for him to put them on and take them off. The color is nice and they are overall a good choice for the cost.

These are surprisingly cute shoes for the wide toe. Usually they’re like ugly shoes that I’ve seen. These are nearly identical to my son’s regular shoes, but these will help his feet. Not a bad price either

评论概述: Wide, durable, and perfect for school!
评论详情: These are the perfect minimal, wide barefoot shoe. My son's feet are wide and we're always looking for school shoes that he can wear that lets his foot move naturally. These are super cute and durable. Thus far, the velcro has held up well! Highly recommend!

评论概述: Super flexible and wide toe box!
评论详情: The first thing I noticed and loved about these shoes is  how wide the footbed is and how flexible the sole is! I don't like stiff soles that don't allow children's feet to move, and these are very flexible!! The fit is nice and wide and super comfortable for a child. The velcro is wide and strong and easy for a child to close. The insole isn't especially cushy but it's not too hard, either. My child really likes wearing these and I love the barefoot style that gives her toes plenty of room. I dont know how long the stink will stay away since they are synthetic, but they do appear washable!
